column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column5: MAGNUS Pro Sit Stand Metal Desk | Secretlab
column7: All desk, no cable mess. Engineered for superior cable management and performance, the stage is set for you to elevate your everyday.
column10: The sit-stand desk I'll be using at the heart of the setup. This is the standard size Magnus at 1.5 M long. One of the things I realized when unboxing all of this is how crazy good everything is packaged. Like you can see here, everything is organized and labeled to perfection, and that makes the building process a lot easier. Cuz you know, building a new desk setup is time-consuming and takes a lot of effort. Even the supply tool kit is aesthetic, and the tools itself are great quality. Things like this go a long way when buying an expensive desk. Something else I appreciate with this new setup is the integrated power supply in cables. The power outlet is uniquely integrated into the legs of the desk, which are just attached to the pre-built power supply underneath the desk. This is a big difference to the other sit-stand desks that I've built. There are pain when it comes to cable management and even with a lot of work, you can still see here that the cables running down my sit-stand desk to this day are all over the place. I personally cannot stand wires, and I'll show you the difference with the Magnus Pro when it's completely built. It's time to flip this desk over and put on some finishing touches. This is the cable management cover for the back end of the desk, and it will help make the mess of cables disappear later. Pulling the protective cover off, you can see how slim this desk is. And here is the sit-stand controls with preset button and a really useful locking button to prevent accidental height adjustments. Yeah, I've almost broke camera gear in the past bumping into the sit-stand desk control panel, so yeah, this is actually quite useful. So, what happens when you get a full metal desk like this and the Secret Lab accessories are all magnetic? Well, you get a chick magnet. Uh, okay, that's a pretty bad joke, but you do end up with the most convenient setup and accessories that can just be changed around by snapping stuff on and off. Even the perfectly sized desk mat is magnetized, so it snaps into place. It's really kind of satisfying.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column7: Discover the features and innovations behind our latest gaming chair, the TITAN Evo. 4-way lumbar support, magnetic head pillow, and more.
column10: Of course, I can't forget about the thing we all used to sit, a chair. This is the gaming chair. I'm sure most of you have heard of it; it's Secret Labs' Titan Evo chair. It uses a hybrid leatherette blend, and the stitching work is pretty incredible. This is my first time sitting on one, and it fits me like a glove, and it feels like I'm sitting on a rar-racing seat, but make it comfortable. Plus, there's a ton of adjustments available to fit exactly how I want it to: four-way lumbar support, plenty of side support, and a full-length backrest for your head too. It works well as both a gaming chair and for general work use. The coolest part, though, pull this lever here and boom, it becomes a life flat chair with an insane 165° of recline. You've got to make sure your butt and back are as comfortable as they can be, you know. So, I'm really happy with how this setup turned out, being able to carve out this small space and transform it into an area I can unwind and comfortably get some gaming hours in. Because we should all work hard, but also, of course, play hard. Using it at night has been a blast. It looks amazing with the smart lights and is just a great vibe while looking pretty minimal and modern. I think I appreciate the fact that this desk setup doubles as a productive editing station for the growing team, which is a big, big bonus. So, using the desk for weeks now, I'm still blown away by how practical the Magnus desk is. Cable management hasn't been easier than this, and the fact that I can just flip up the cable management cover and add in new devices without going under the desk is honestly underrated. A big, big thank you to Secret Lab for making this setup possible.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column7:
- Designed exclusively for the Secretlab MAGNUS. Fits perfectly into the cable tray opening with a specially machined base clamp that works seamlessly with the rear hinged cover.
- Easy installation with top screw mount. Find your ideal position with a premium tensile spring mechanism that supports the full range of tilt, swivel and rotation adjustments. 
- Built-in channels make cable routing easy. Magnetic cable guides snap on and off, so you can hide all your cords from view. 
- Free up close to 100% space on your desk, so you have even more room to do so much more. 
- Full powder-coated aluminum construction. Choose from single or dual arms to fit your setup.
column10: I'm hooking up the Gigabyte M32 UC monitor on this Magnus monitor arm for a clutter-free and minimal looking space, and I personally like when a monitor looks like it just hovers in your field of view.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column7:
- Securely mount your PC beneath your Secretlab MAGNUS Pro to free up space on your desk.
- Never worry about your cable routing, even when adjusting your desk height.
- Pull-pin design for easy adjustability when adjusting to the height of your PC tower.
- Easy access push button to adjust clamp width when securing your PC tower.
- Works on either side of your desk.
column10: Next up is mounting the PC itself. I'll be using the PC Mount to save some precious desk space by hooking up the PC to this mount and underneath the desk. This way, it sort of just floats there, and the airflow intake for the PC fans are optimal. I know you guys called me out for leaving this PC on the carpet floor in my previous videos, and I heard you, so now it's floating. This workhorse powering the gaming setup is built with an Asus 6900 XD GPU, AMD Ryzen 76800 X, and a couple of 2 TB m.2 SSDs. The Defined Seven dark tempered case here goes really well with the blackout desk. Surprisingly, I'll leave a link on screen if you want to check out the full build of this PC, but yeah, it's quite the weapon and powerful to run almost all games maxed out and for Premier Pro workflows.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column7: Lift Screens & Organize Space. Available in three sizes. Designed to Improve Ergonomics & Workflow. Crafted with Premium Hardwood, Aluminum & Natural Cork. Handmade in USA. Elevate Your Work Now!
column10: With one of my favorite desk accessory brands, Grovemade, this package here is their new small Dash shelf in matte black, and the extra small size of the shelf should fit in perfectly with the Magnus desk. Aesthetically, the matte black style is also a perfect companion to the dark desk tone. So, attaching this shelf altogether was easy enough, being made of quality powder-coated fireboard and ebonized cork with sui ink. I've also got these new small and medium-sized desk trays in dark cork, and these will neatly hold some useful things when I'm working on this desk. I love the fact that Grovemade finally made new tray sizes, so we can make full use of the shelf space, and they fit perfectly, as you can see here. So, you guys know that I love Grovemade, and it continues to be a staple of my setups. They're pricey, but to be fair, I've owned my pieces for years now, and most of them look as good as new, in big part thanks to the build and quality material used like hand-sculpted cork and Japanese calligraphy ink to give it that beautifully dark hue and long-life resistance.

column5: GIGABYTE M32UC 32" 144Hz (160Hz OC) 4K UHD Curved Gaming Monitor
column7:
The GIGABYTE M32UC Gaming Monitor packs upscale performance into a streamlined package. The M32UC provides a fluid and vibrant gaming experience in 4K resolution with 1ms response time, 144Hz (160Hz OC) refresh rate, and compatibility with graphics card software.
• 31.5" SS VA 3840 x 2160 4K (UHD) Display Curved Gaming Monitor.Viewing Angle 178°(H)/178°(V). VESA Wall Mounting(mm) 100*100 mm.Brightness : 350 cd/m2(TYP). Contrast Ratio : 3000:1..Standby Power : 0.5W

column10: As for the monitor, I'll be using the Gigabyte M32 UC, which I've come to love for gaming. I'm hooking it up on this Magnus monitor arm for a clutter-free and minimal looking space. And I personally like when a monitor looks like it just hovers in your field of view. This 32-inch monitor is also slightly curved for an immersive experience and pairs up with the fact that it also supports 4K and up to 160 Hz refresh rate via DisplayPort 1.5 for, and you've got the perfect gaming display for smaller spaces like this one here.

You can't go wrong with these as a gaming pair, and I think they look so clean in the black and white aesthetic in this gaming setup.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column7:
Discover a deeper, highly immersive gaming experience that brings the action to life in the palms of your hands. The DualSense wireless controller offers immersive haptic feedback, dynamic adaptive triggers and a built-in microphone, all integrated into an iconic comfortable design. Compared to DUALSHOCK 4 wireless controller. Available when feature is supported by game.
• Haptic feedback - Feel physically responsive feedback to your in-game actions with dual actuators which replace traditional rumble motors. In your hands, these dynamic vibrations can simulate the feeling of everything from environments to the recoil of different weapons. .Operating temperature : 41 °F to 95 °F (5 °C to 35 °C)

• Adaptive triggers - Experience varying levels of force and tension as you interact with your in-game gear and environments. From pulling back an increasingly tight bowstring to hitting the brakes on a speeding car, feel physically connected to your on-screen actions.

• Built-in microphone and headset jack - Chat with friends online using the built-in microphone or by connecting a headset to the 3.5mm jack. Easily switch voice capture on and off at a moment’s notice with the dedicated mute button. Internet and account for PlayStation Network required.

• DualSense Controller PS5 and PC compatible. Not compatible with PS4.

• PS Remote Play requires Remote Play App connected to Wi-Fi, PS4 or PS5 console with the latest system software and compatible game. A PS4 or PS5 console with a wired connection via a LAN cable is recommended. Version 4.0 of the Remote Play App on iOS and iPadOS or version 4.1 on macOS is required for games to be playable with the controller over Bluetooth.

• Devices with macOS 11.3, iOS 14.5, iPadOS 14.5 or tvOS 14.5 or later supported.

• Cable not included. To connect or charge the controller use the USB cable supplied with the PS5 console. Controllers sold separately.
column10: I've also got a PS5 controller in arms' reach for sessions on F1 or Forza Horizon. It's obviously loads more fun playing on the controller for these games than a keyboard and mouse. But I should probably eventually invest in a gaming steering wheel. Drop a comment below if you have any suggestions for that wheel.

column5: Audioengine A2+ Wireless Bluetooth Computer Speakers
column7:
• PREMIUM WIRELESS SPEAKERS FOR GAMING - The Audioengine A2+ Bluetooth Speakers are the best wireless desktop monitor speakers for surround sound TV and more. With extended-range Bluetooth connectivity, these wireless powered speakers can quickly and seamlessly connect to devices up to 100 feet away.

• INCREDIBLE SOUND - The A2+ 60 Watt Wireless Computer Speakers with subwoofer output deliver high-fidelity true stereo sound that connects to any app or device. This 2-speaker home surround sound system features USB and analog AUX input options, subwoofer output, 2.75" custom aramid fiber woofers and 0.75" silk dome tweeters wrapped in precision-tuned, hand-crafted cabinets.

• VERSATILE COMPACT DESIGN - These compact Bluetooth speakers for home may be small, but they pack a big punch with room-filling bass, a variety of connection options, and a sleek design that looks great on any desktop. Perfect gaming speakers for Mac or PC, works out of the box with no hassle or software to install.

• ALL SYSTEMS AND SUPPLIES INCLUDED - Audioengine A2+ Home Stereo System includes a pair of Wireless Powered Speakers, 6.5ft speaker wire, power supply & cord, 5ft USB cable, 5ft mini-jack audio cable, microfiber speaker and cable bags, and setup guide.

• WIRELESS SPEAKERS PAIR WITH WARRANTY - Based in Austin, TX, Audioengine is proud to provide a premium computer speaker and home stereo system with painted wood cabinets that add elegance to any studio, home, office, store, or theater. US-based customer support and 3 year product warranty is included.
column10: For immersive sound, I've set up the trusty Audio Engine A2 Plus speakers in black to complement the blackout aesthetic. I've been using these desktop speakers for years now, and I've yet to find one that looks and sounds better than these. Pro tip though, get stands for your desktop speakers to angle up because otherwise, for the A2 Plus speakers, highs are noticeably muted because the tweeters on your desk fire towards your chest and not your ears.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column5: Kanto S6 Tilted Desktop Speaker Stands for Large Bookshelf Speakers
column7:
Improve the placement of your 4- to 7-inch speakers while maintaining a low-profile desktop setup. Providing 16° of tilt, S6 desktop speaker stands are designed to angle your speakers towards your ears, ensuring you experience the full range of frequencies they have to offer. Each stand features foam padding to reduce vibration when you have the sound cranked up, and includes a mounting hole and 1/4”-20 screw to secure your YU6, TUK or other compatible speakers in place.     S6 stands angle your speakers 16° upwards to ensure you capture every frequency they have to offer Using the provided 1/4”-20 screw, secure your speakers in place to prevent movement or accidental tipping Closed cell foam padding on each stand's top and bottom help isolate your speakers and reduce undesirable resonance Each stand is constructed out of 5mm solid steel in order to support up to 20 pounds
• IMPROVED SOUND - Due to their short wavelength, higher frequencies can easily go unheard unless directed towards your ears. S6 stands angle your speakers 16° upwards to ensure you capture every frequency they have to offer.

• GREATER STABILITY - Using the provided 1/4”-20 screw, secure your YU6, TUK, YU Passive 5.25" or other compatible speakers in place to prevent movement or accidental tipping.

• REDUCED VIBRATION - Closed cell foam padding on the top and bottom of each stand helps to isolate your speakers and reduce undesirable resonance, ensuring your sound remains clear and uncolored.

• MINIMALISTIC DESIGN - Using as little material as possible, the low-profile design of S6 speaker stands helps to keep your desktop looking clutter-free.

• HIGH WEIGHT CAPACITY - Each stand is constructed out of 5mm solid steel in order to support up to 20 pounds. This also makes them extremely durable and resistant to vibration.
column10: Pro tip, though: get stands for your desktop speakers to angle up, because otherwise, for the A2 Plus speakers, highs are noticeably muted because the tweeters on your desk fire towards your chest and not your ears.

column1: The DREAM Desk Setup 2023 – Productivity & Gaming Setup
column5: Belkin Thunderbolt 3 Dock Pro w/ Thunderbolt 3 Cable
column7:
Introducing the Thunderbolt 3 Dock Pro - the ultimate docking solution for your Mac or Windows laptop. This smart, fast, and streamlined dock offers innovative solutions designed to suit both professional and at-home users. Enjoy super-fast data transfer speeds of up to 40 Gbps*, high-definition dual monitor support, and 85W upstream charging to power your connected laptop. It also features multiple ports to connect your peripherals and networks via USB-A, USB-C, Ethernet, SD, and more. Connect multiple devices to your laptop through a single dock, including monitors, hard drives, drawing tablet, mouse, keyboard, internet, and more. The best part is that you can connect all this to your Thunderbolt 3 or USB-C-enabled laptop by connecting a single cable, or disconnecting just as easily. A 0.8M/2.6ft. Thunderbolt 3 cable is included to create your perfect workstation setup.The SD (secure digital) card slot supports Ultra-High-Speed II (UHS-II), to transfer data quickly at up to 312 MB/s bus speed. Supporting standard SD cards, SDHC (High-Capacity) cards and SDXC (Extended-Capacity) cards, UHS-II can transfer a full day’s camera footage three times faster than UHS-I.Enjoy easy access to monitors, networks, power and peripherals: FRONT: 1 x USB-A 3.1 port, 1 x USB-C 3.1 port, SD card reader, Audio in/out BACK: 170W PSU (Power Supply Unit), Thunderbolt 3 port, Thunderbolt 3/USB-C peripherals, DisplayPort, Gb Ethernet, 4 x USB-A 3.0 ports Note: The new M1-based MacBooks does not support dual “Extended” displays through their Thunderbolt 3 ports. This means that when using any M1-based MacBooks, users cannot extend their desktop over two displays via the Thunderbolt 3 Port. All other functions of the dock will operate as normal.
• ROOM FOR ALL YOUR PERIPHERALS: Enjoy easy access to monitors, networks, power, and peripherals with multiple ports available. This windows and mac docking station has 12 ports including Thunderbolt, USB-A, USB-C, Ethernet, SD and Audio ports - all through a single cable.

• POWER TO SHARE: This charging dock is the perfect way to keep your laptop powered up and ready to go. With its included 170W power supply unit, the Thunderbolt 3 Dock Pro can provide up to 85W of power for a connected laptop. Also known as "upstream charging," this keeps your laptop charged while in use, without a separate power cable.

• ULTRA-HIGH DEFINITION MONITOR SUPPORT: Enjoy ultra-high definition 4K dual monitor support to create a versatile working station. This Belkin docking station makes it easy to connect and use two monitors at once, while also charging your device at the same time.

• THUNDERBOLT CABLE INCLUDED: The dock also includes a thunderbolt cable, which is 2.6ft / 0.8m long. This allows you to connect your laptop to the dock from further away, making it more versatile for different desk configurations.

• THE ULTIMATE WORKSTATION: This Belkin Thunderbolt Docking station is the best in class when it comes to power, speed and pixels. This smart dock is compatible with Mac and Windows, simply connect your Thunderbolt 3 or USB-C laptop to instantly create a powerful workstation.
column10: So, I mentioned earlier that I want this desk set up to also be an editing station for others who come into the studio. So, I got this Thunderbolt dock to add more ports right here on the desk for convenience, which is going to be really important when we dump files from our SD cards or even if I just want to charge the mouse or keyboard directly from the desk. I can just do that right from the Thunderbolt dock here. You can never have enough ports and connectivity in a setup, honestly.

column7:

ScreenLinear Pro computer monitor lamp surpass normal desk lamp to provide exceptional eye-friendly illumination, helping develop healthier visual habits during screen time while reducing the risk of myopia. Our monitor light bar reaches optimal use with a power supply greater than or equal to 5V/1A. The weighted clip gently rests on nearly any monitor with thickness from 0.3" to 1.4". Features a stylish black metal main body, this monitor lamp from Quntis is sturdy yet feels great to touch. 1 x Quntis Lamp Bar 2 x Adjustment Cover 1 x 6.5ft Type-C Cable 1 x User Guide Note: For the Ultra Thin Bezel Monitor, hang the light bar directly on it without the need for an adjustment block.
• 【No Blue Light Hazard & Flicker-Free Lighting】Certified to meet the IEC/TR 62778 and IEC/EN 62471 standards, Quntis monitor light bar effectively eliminates harmful blue light that may affect vision, reducing eye irritation and providing optimal eye protection. Enjoy our flicker-free illumination that provides a stable light source without worrying about eye discomfort. Experience a truly comfortable and eye-friendly illumination with Quntis computer monitor light.

• 【No Screen Glare & Space Saving】The innovative asymmetrical optical design only illuminates your desk area, enhancing immersion and focus while ensuring no reflected glare on your screen. Unlike normal desk lamps, our scientifically designed weighted clip easily mounts on top of the monitor, saving valuable desk space. Come with two different thickness adjustment covers, Quntis desk light bar perfectly fits for 15-22'' monitor (0.3" to 1.4" thick). NOT SUITABLE FOR LAPTOPS OR CURVED MONITORS!

• 【Auto-Dimming & Manual Stepless Dimming】Built-in ambient light sensor continuously monitors the surrounding brightness and intelligently supplements the existing light to the 700lux. Prevents excessive or insufficient lighting that can visual fatigue, creating an eye-healthy light environment for work and leisure. ScreenLinear Pro monitor lamp can also be manually adjusted for brightness and color temperature (3000K-6500K) to customize preferred lighting to feel most comfortable to your eyes.

• 【Close to Natural Light & Ultra-High Ra98 Color Rendering Index】Our computer light bar features 78 high-quality LED beads, offering uniform and adequate lighting while minimizing shadows and glare, creating a comfortable lighting environment for reading, working, and gaming. High CRI enhances vibrant and true-to-life colors, making objects on your screen appear vivid and realistic. Whether you're reading, gaming, or spending long hours in front of a computer screen, ScreenLinear Pro is the perfect solution to ensure a comfortable visual experience.
column10: Something I almost always have on a desk, that I've got to add here, is a desk light bar. This is an affordable one for like 49 bucks from Ergotune. It helps reduce eye strain from the monitor and creates a really nice warm atmosphere when it lights up the desk at night.
